page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE Cont.
page.content:
In Assembly we will all sing a hymn out of hymn books then Mr. Lowe, our headmaster, talks to us.
When it has finished we will go back to our classroom and do work till 10.30am. that is playtime. After our play we will go back to our classrooms and do maths till 12.00 then we go to have dinner. When all on our table have finished eating, we can go out to play. When the bell has gone we will go to our classroom and wait for Miss Hepworth. When Miss Hepworth gets into the classroom she will call the register to see if everyone is here. Then we will do some work till 2.15pm then go out to play.
